Key Match Events: Dalton Knecht scored a basket to trim the Raptors' lead in the third quarter, sparking Lakers' momentum.
Dalton Knecht hit a 3-point shot to give the Lakers a 79-77 lead.
LeBron James had 19 points, 10 rebounds, and 16 assists, while Anthony Davis scored 22 points before an injury.
Austin Reaves led the Lakers with a team-high 27 points.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Lakers improved to 6-4 with the win.
The game was played at the Crypto.com Arena.
